attributes.action: Let high risk people claim a percentage of their wages
attributes.additional_details: Being an individual who has received a notification from the NHS to isolate myself for 12 weeks but can only receive statutory sick pay, unlike some other members of society who can be furloughed and receive 80% of their wages. I believe we should all be entitled to claim a percentage of our wages.
attributes.background: Enable all members of society who are considered high risk and have received a NHS notification to isolate for 12 weeks following the coronavirus to be furloughed and claim percentage of their wages if their employer will keep them on the pay roll.
